name: today'snewstenminutes
0:
”Alexa, open the newsworthy.”
”Alexa, tell the newsworthy play the latest episode.”
”Alexa, tell the newsworthy browse recent episodes.”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the newsworthy
des:
theNewsWorthy is all the day’s news you need to know in less than 10 minutes. It's a daily news roundup made easier, faster and more fun! Each day includes the latest in politics, tech, business and entertainment so you’re always in-the-know on a variety of topics. You’ll get an unbiased view of today’s news through a collection of news sources; you never get opinions or just one side of the story. 

Award-winning broadcast journalist and former TV news reporter Erica Mandy is founder and host of theNewsWorthy. She combines more than a decade of journalism experience with her own voice and style. Available weekdays by 4 a.m. ET.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
